brewery.name: 40 North Brewing
brewery.description: Currently in planning.  For info contact 40NorthBrewing@gmail.com

brewery.name: BJ's Restaurant and Brewery
brewery.description:
To brew consistently great beer in a variety of ale and lager styles. That's really what BJ's beer is all about.

At BJ's we recognize that brewing is both an art and a science.

We also respect the vast variety of beer styles that the world has to offer - from the delicate balance of German Kolsch to the robust intensity of Russian Imperial Stout.

Our Passionate and talented team of brewers strives toward one simple goal: to brew consistently great beer in a variety of ale and lager styles. That's really what BJ's beer is all about.

brewery.name: The ChopHouse & Brewery
brewery.description: As a popular gathering place, our pride is in serving American steakhouse classics, paired with the city’s finest handcrafted beers brewed on site. But we are much more than a steakhouse, offering a great experience at an affordable price, with hand-cut chops, fresh seafood and an extensive wine list, all in a unique turn of the century bank transformed into one of Washington’s hot spots.

brewery.name: Vindication Brewing Co.
brewery.description: A Brewery Founded on the Principles of Craft and Precision, with an Obsession for the Details of Quality, and a Belief in the Power of Beer to Bring People Together.

brewery.name: Upslope Brewing Company
brewery.description:
Located in Boulder with two tap rooms (Flatiron Park & Lee Hill), Upslope taps into Colorado's active lifestyle by offering superior quality, hand-crafted ales & lagers in cans for the on-the-go beer enthusiast.

Ascend to New Heights.

brewery.name: Upslope Brewing Company

Ascend to New Heights.

brewery.name: Los Oasis Latin Grill & Cerveceria
brewery.description: Brewing our own Beer will be a staple here at Los Oasis. Head Brewmaster Mike Kasian has plans of producing Latin Lagers and Ales which are inspired by some of Mexico's and South America's favorites. There will be 5 house brews on tap as well as a wide variety of wines from Spain , Chile, and Argentina.

brewery.name: Open Door Brewing Company
brewery.description: Packaging brewery based in Lafayette, CO.

brewery.name: Redstone Meadery
brewery.description:
David Myers, known as 'Chairman of the Mead', founder of Redstone Meadery, is a romantic and wants to see mead once again enjoying the glory days of yesteryear. He started the Boulder, Colorado company with the 'natural philosophy' that he produce the highest quality honey wine on the market.

Because of this 'philosophy of mead', Redstone does not cork (to avoid oxidation) but instead uses swing top bottles. This ensures the mead will not breathe while cellaring plus offers a much longer shelf life once the bottle has been opened.

In keeping with the 'natural' approach, Redstone does not add any sulfites, a known allergen, as honey is it's own natural preservative. Redstone only pasteurizes the must (unfermented mead) and never boils. The company strives to feature the flavors of the fermentable as much as possible.

In 2003 Redstone Meadery brought the International Mead Festival (www.meadfest.com) to Boulder, Colorado and with that helped to establish mead as its own beverage category. Also at this time Redstone spearheaded the creation of the International Mead Association (www.meadfest.org) to help promote and educate the masses about the world's first fermented beverage.

Currently, Redstone products are distributed to 20 states across the U.S., making it the widest distributed wine from the state of Colorado and one of the most widely distributed meads in the country! From the Northwest to the Southeast, Ask for Mead!

brewery.name: BRU
brewery.description: Our beer isn’t just a beer. It’s great beer, and a great beer isn’t just about barley, water, yeast, and hops. A great beer is about the people that make it; it is an expression of who we are. Our craft, our passion, and our love captured in a bottle (or a glass) for you to enjoy. First, it starts with writing the recipes and the thoughtful selection of the ingredients that go in them. Ingredie...See More

brewery.name: Colorado Brewing Company
brewery.description: New Brewhouse/Micro-Brewery in downtown Boulder, CO. What was the Redfish Brewhouse location, the Colorado Brewing Company/Boulder Draft House opened its doors February 20, 2009. We are a Boulder brewhouse serving amazing comfort food that is regionally and globally inspired along with perfectly balanced handcrafted beers for the everyday beer drinker and the micro-brew enthusiast, all served in a friendly and comfortable setting that is enhanced by quality live music several days a week

brewery.name: FATE Brewing Company
brewery.description: FATE Brewing Company is Boulder’s first brew-bistro and your new place to enjoy chef-inspired, gourmet creations with unique, handcrafted microbrews. Local ingredients are featured on the lunch, brunch, and dinner menus and the full bar with 30 taps feature house drafts and rotating guest beer. Stop by for a pint and a bite at 1600 38th Street and Arapahoe Road (one block west of Foothills Parkway) in Boulder, Colorado.

brewery.name: Asher Brewing Company
brewery.description:
At Asher Brewing Company our mission is operate a successful brewery that produces world-class certified organic ales, while utilizing environmentally sustainable and socially responsible business practices. Our brewery is run on 100% wind power!

Chris Asher decided that the Boulder market deserved to have locally brewed organic beers. After nearly a year of planning, research, and hard work building a brewery, Asher Brewing Company opened the doors for business on November 20th, 2009.  

On February 25th, 2010 organic certification was issued for all beers at Asher Brewing Company; making it the first all organic brewery in the state of Colorado. Organic ingredients are better for the consumer, better for the environment, and better for the beer. (Studies have shown that pesticides are detrimental to the shelf-life of beer.)

USDA Organic Brewery

brewery.name: Sanitas Brewing
brewery.description: Founded in 2013, Boulder’s Sanitas Brewing Company is regarded for their signature blend of tradition and innovation as well as their use of only the finest ingredients. With a passion for exploration, Sanitas epitomizes the wild spirit of Colorado with a variety of premium beers.

brewery.name: Avery Brewing Company
brewery.description: Since 1993 our brewery has been committed to producing eccentric ales and lagers that defy styles or categories. Our products are thoroughly American at heart: blending Old World tradition and expertise with ingenuity, creativity and boldness.

brewery.name: Avery Brewing Company
brewery.description: Since 1993 our brewery has been committed to producing eccentric ales and lagers that defy styles or categories. Our products are thoroughly American at heart: blending Old World tradition and expertise with ingenuity, creativity and boldness.

brewery.name: Boulder Beer Company
brewery.description: Boulder Beer Company, Colorado's First Craft Brewery, was founded in 1979 when two University of Colorado professors applied for and received the 43rd brewing license in the United States.  The brewery has a full service pub that's open for lunch and dinner, with a spacious outdoor beer garden offering amazing view of Boulder's Flatirons. Brewery Tours Mon-Sat at 2pm, and Sat at 4pm.

brewery.name: Walnut Brewery
brewery.description:
Boulder's Original Brewpub and winner of multiple Great American Beer Festival® awards including the 2008 Silver Medal & 2010 Gold Medal in the "English-Style Dark Mild Ale or Brown Ale" categories for "Old Elk Brown Ale"

We are located in the heart of downtown Boulder with great food, great service & great people!

brewery.name: Acidulous Brewing Company
brewery.description:
Acidulous is a Boulder based brewery specializing in Sour Beers! We are currently contract brewing with Crazy Mountain in Edwards. We are on the search for a location, once we get a taproom location locked down we will announce more plans for the future! For now, check out your local Boulder area liquor stores (and several outside of Boulder) and pick up a 6 pack of our Sour Wheat Ale! An america spin on the Berliner Weisse, it's clean and tart, and ready for summer! Please share our page, try the beer, and spread the word! 
Cheers!

brewery.name: Shine Brewing Company
brewery.description:
Shine Restaurant & Gathering Place is a place for us all to nourish ourselves through food, community, dance, education and celebration. It is hub for us all to share our gifts, to explore, and to have fun doing it. It truly is a place where we can all Shine.

The Blissful Sisters, previously of restaurant and music venue Trilogy have been in the creative process of Shine for the past few years. So much in their individual life experiences and the amazing people they have connected with over the years have been a huge inspiration for the concept. They feel that NOW IS THE TIME where we need a sense of community — to eat, heal and live well — it is so important to our well-being. Shine is a gift for all of us.

brewery.name: New Planet Beer Company
brewery.description:
New Planet Beer specializes in great tasting craft ales, that are 100%gluten-free, offering a range of beer styles that can be enjoyed by any craft beer drinker, but especially by those that gluten-free is their only option. Unrivaled in flavor, quality, taste and care, New Planet is everything a craft beer should be.

The brand is grounded on what’s good for the earth and for the individual, and is about discovering something better. That’s why New Planet is dedicated to donating a portion of their proceeds to help make the planet better for all of us.

brewery.name: Finkel & Garf Brewing Co.
brewery.description: Brewing high quality craft beer in Boulder, CO. Check back for info on our opening date. You can also follow us on Instagram, @finkelandgarf.

brewery.name: Guest Brewing Company
brewery.description:
Guest Brewing is currently a group of friends dedicated to the art of brewing beer. There are 4 of us, and we brew about 1.5 batches a week. We all know and love beer, and enjoy learning and experiencing more through our own craft. We are big fans of sharing beer and have friends over during the brew to sample previous batches, or other craft beer.

Our goal is to continue to hone our skills at brewing and prepare to launch a brewery. We do this by brewing, talking, and thinking beer often. We share beer with friends often and always welcome feedback. We will also be launching an official Beta Tasting program soon that will offer free beer in exchange for some consumer feedback.

brewery.name: J Wells Brewery
brewery.description:
Long time Home brewer using the best ingredients from all over the world to bring the finest brews to you.

4 legged friends always welcome, can book for private events on hours or days I am usually not open, growlers available and food is allowed to be brought in. I do have peanuts available.

brewery.name: Mountain Sun Brewery
brewery.description: "Hippies, mountain bikers, and locals flock here for some of Boulder's best microbrews. The low-priced, healthy fare includes massive mixed-green salads, big burritos and even non-garden-variety burgers, like the Black and Blue burger, with blue cheese and blackened seasoning. The Junk burger is loaded with everything in the kitchen. Drink options include the coffee-alcohol Java Porter, or the XXX Pale Ale, a hoppy brew with flavor and bite."

brewery.name: West Flanders Brewing Co.
brewery.description: West Flanders Brewing Co. is a Belgian-inspired brewpub located in the heart of Boulder's historic Pearl Street Mall. We create style-bending, singular beers that demonstrate how craft and passion come together. We hope you'll join us on our journey of exploration!

brewery.name: Wild Woods Brewery
brewery.description: Wild Woods is a microbrewery in Boulder, Colorado that creates handcrafted beers inspired by the outdoors. Our beers begin with recognizable styles and are brewed to highlight elements of the wilderness.
